tool_description: Access to the official Dominican Republic company Register, ideal for KYB purposes
name: Dominican Republic Company Data
title: Dominican Republic Company Data

api_list.name: Search by RNC
api_list.description: Search the company register using the RNC number
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dominican-republic-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/default/DO/09700205710"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dominican-republic-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dominican-republic-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/default/DO/{rnc}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dominican-republic-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
